list.project_desc: BeeHive is a REI on-chain Play and Earn RPG game based on the very efficient Tri-Token architecture and playable by anyone. The game takes place on the beehive where 3,000 Bees NFTs work as a community to earn real value cryptocurrencies.Join the colony by buying an Bee NFT, start working and earn $HONEY (BeeGold) salary. Turn it to $SUG for energy, mine to earn more.
list.project_comments: If you made it here, you know BeeHive doesn't look like any Play and Earn game. Our goal is to bring continous innovation to make GameFi evolve, and place BeeHive as a trend-setter in this ecosystem. BeeHive is the first checkpoint of many, and we believe in the value of community. Our goal is to spread the Bee Nation across chains and borders, to create a world full of Bees involved in a welded community. BeeHive ecosystem starts with Bees, however next gen NFTs could be totally different, while integrating to the actual economy with brand new in-game interactions.
